TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 42, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 24, "index": 13}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 39, "index": 30}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}]
thought: I need to craft end_stone_bricks and the recipe requires 4 end_stone. I will move the end_stone from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
